items.sentence: Please shut the door behind you when you leave.
Didn\'t you know I didn\'t want Tom to do that?
I\'m pretty sure I\'ll be in Boston in October.
Tom smiled at Mary when she came into the room.
Tom smuggled something into Australia for Mary.
Tom speaks French better than you might expect.
Tom is a delinquent who comes from a rich home.
Tom is in desperate need of a heart transplant.
I know that I don\'t want to be married to you.
Tom can\'t forgive Mary for behaving like that.
I\'ll try not to take up too much of your time.
Is there anyone here who\'s not busy right now?
It seems to me that this isn\'t entirely wrong.
Tom\'s biggest fear is marrying the wrong girl.
Why don\'t you just stay home and take it easy?
Why won\'t Tom let his kids go camping with us?
Tom waited expectantly for something to happen.
Tom waited while Mary was shopping for clothes.
Tom asked Mary a question she couldn\'t answer.
I think I\'m going to go to Boston next summer.
